Computer.name: bit4bit Disabled IRC
Computer.file:
Uhhh, guys?
When was the last time this server was used? I went and did a physical inspection on it and the hard drive platters are literally growing mold. Probably going to have to replace these; escalating the matter to maintenance staff.
~ SmiffMcCool, First Line Support ... if you'll ever read this note at all

IRCDaemon.name: bit4bit Disabled Channel
IRCDaemon.post: hey i think i let my account expire here, i promise i'm not collecting
